name: Tag Mellowfee Helps Baldi
description:
Tag had enough of being the player. So He decided to Help Baldi get you

You play as Zolt from Baldi's fun new school and get all 7 notebooks.

Credits to SeenwonderAlex for 5th Prize.

Inspiration

Playtime Helps Baldi by MichaelDoesGaming

Bully Helps Baldi by TheEnkoded

Credits to SadColoredStudios for the Open Source
